name: Johnathan (by Team Johnathan)
description:
Jonathan moves to New York, gets a new job, and has to manage the stress of his new life. He will have to overcome these challenges and many more to make it to the end of the day and finally get some rest. It is a visual novel and 2d shooter. The current state of the project is unfinished. The visual novel aspects have less narrative than we would want, and the 2d shooter aspect of the game is not implemented. If we would want to finish the game we would add to the story in the visual novel portion of the game and add the 2d shooter aspect of the game.

Team Johnathan is:

Kyle Chiasson, Eli George, Luke Welday
